mapper.select: select mno , user_id , user_pwd , user_name , nickname , phone , profile , point , u_status , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enroll_date , sleep_date , escape_date from member where u_status = 'Y' and grade = 'A' and user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from member where u_status = 'Y' and grade in ('S', 'T')
select mno , user_id , user_name , nickname , phone , grade , enroll_date from member where u_status = 'Y' order by mno desc
select count(*) from member where u_status = 'Y' and grade = 'S'
select mno , user_id , user_name , nickname , phone , grade , enroll_date from member where u_status = 'Y' and grade = 'S' order by mno desc
select count(*) from member where u_status = 'Y' and grade = 'T'
select mno , user_id , user_name , nickname , phone , grade , enroll_date from member where u_status = 'Y' and grade = 'T' order by mno desc
select count(*) from couponlist

select cno , cname , discount , maxcount , to_char(dedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dedate , NVL((select count(*) from coupon group by cno having couponlist.cno = coupon.cno), 0) as count from couponlist order by cno desc
select cno , cname , discount , maxcount , to_char(dedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dedate from couponlist where cno = #{cno}
select mno , user_id , user_name from member where u_status='Y' and grade = 'S'
select count(*) from pay

select order_no , mno , user_id , user_name , pay_amount , pay_date , pay_method , order_status , refund_date from pay left join s_refund using (order_no) join member using(mno) order by order_no desc

select order_no , mno , user_name , address , phone , pay_amount , to_char(pay_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') pay_date , pay_method , order_status , pay_status , deposit_ck , use_point , use_coupon , pay.point , d_fee , to_char(REFUND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REFUND_DATE , REFUND_NO , REFUND_STATUS from pay left join s_refund using (order_no) join member using(mno) where order_no = #{sOrderNo}
select order_no , pno , title , opno , quantity , s.price from s_buylist s join store using (pno) where order_no = ${sOrderNo}
mapper.insert: insert into s_refund ( refund_no , order_no , refund , refund_date , refund_status ) values ( SEQ_SREFUNDNO.nextval , #{orderNo} , #{refund} , sysdate , 2 )
mapper.select: select count(*) from report
select report_no , reported_mno , bcategory , rep_bno , content , status from report order by report_no desc

select report_no , reported_mno , user_id , bcategory , rep_bno , rp.content , rp.status , rv.content as rpcontent from report rp join s_review rv on rv.rno = rp.rep_bno join member using (mno) where report_no = #{reportNo}

select report_no , reported_mno , user_id , bcategory , rep_bno , rp.content , rp.status , rv.content as rpcontent from report rp join class_review rv on rv.c_rno = rp.rep_bno join member using (mno) where report_no = #{reportNo}

select report_no , reported_mno , user_id , bcategory , rep_bno , rp.content , rp.status , rv.reply_content as rpcontent from report rp join reply rv on rv.reply_no = rp.rep_bno join member using (mno) where report_no = #{reportNo}
